data.text: Jop ua kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze:
Gumazir arazir kurabagh amiba igharaz darazir nguaziba okɨmasa,
Gumazir kurar kaba, arazir kurar kam gami, me borir afeziaba ovengezibar, donkiba okei.
Gumazamizir dagɨaba ko biziba puvatɨziba, gumazir kurar kaba, me gamima me atiati,
Onganarazibagh amir gumazamizir kaba, mevzika, me mangɨ gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn ikiam.
Me gumazir igharazibar nguazibar ghua dagher bar kurabara isi.
Me dɨmagaribar, mɨkarzir kɨnibar akuava arugharusi.
Me mɨghsɨamɨn itir danganimɨn itima, amozim me gizima me kumkui.
“Gumazir kurar kaba ghua, amizir paba ovengezibar,
Gumazamizir kaba, mevzika, me uan mɨkarziba avamin korotiaba puvatɨ.
Me olivɨn temebar tongɨn ikia dar ovɨziba mɨrmɨrir danganimɨn dagɨamɨn da mɨrmɨri,
Nguibar ekiabar aven ovengasava amir gumazamiziba puvɨram arai.
“Gumazamizir maba God ifongezir arazibar tuavimɨn gɨn mangan aghua.
Bar mɨzaraghara, amɨnim tɨghar tiam, gumazir kuraba dɨkavigh mangɨ
Poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim gamir gumaziba, me aruem bararti,
Dɨmagarimɨn okɨmakɨar gumaziba dɨpeniba akara aven ghua biziba okei.
Gumazir kaba aruer ekiamɨn daruan atiati, mati gumazir igharaziba dɨmagarimɨn daruan atiati.
“Ia kamaghɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨar kabanang gami,
Aruem anaga isɨrazɨma ghuariar orangtɨzim ghua gefi.
Eghtɨ men mɨkarziba apizibar dagher isɨngtɨzimɨn mɨn otogham.
“Gumazir kurar kaba paza furabaghatir amizibagh ami.
Ezɨ God uan gavgavimɨn, gumazir gavgavibar akurvazima, me dughiar ruaribar iti.
God me gamima, me nɨmɨram apiav ikia osɨmtɨziba men puvatɨ.
Ezɨ me ziar ekiaba iti.
Nan mɨgɨrɨgɨaba guizɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨaba puvatɨghtɨ,
